name: mithril-ui-form-project
description: Based on a JSON document, generate a UI form for the Mithril framework.
author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)

scripts.postinstall: npm run link && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:local && lerna run --parallel clean
scripts.patch-release: npm run clean && npm run build && lerna run patch-release --parallel
scripts.minor-release: npm run clean && npm run build && lerna run minor-release --parallel
